tekst: PIKSEL 2003-2024 elektronisk kunst og fri teknologi PIKSEL FESTIVAL CONCERTS PIKSEL FESTIVAL EXHIBITIONS Piksel 2003-2016 elektronisk kunst og fri teknologi Piksel is an international network and annual event for electronic art and technological freedom. Part workshop, part festival, it is organised in Bergen, Norway, and involves participants from more than a dozen countries exchanging ideas, coding, presenting art and software projects, doing workshops, performances and discussions on PIKSEL FESTIVAL the aesthetics and politics of free WORKSHOPS technologies. PIKSEL KidZ 2015-2024 STUDIO 207 2017-2024 PIKSEL SPECIAL PROGRAMS Inclusive Digital Laboratory for Experimental Art
